aim_desc:
Our army uses those a lot. They
give them higher accuracy, and we
mass produced them in the great goblin war.
ammo_holder_desc:
Oh now this thing will give
me {PERCENT}% more ammo space!
I wish food and other stuff could
fit in here.
arcane_battery_desc:
Probably first powerbank I ever found.
Tho, who needs a mana powerbank???
arcane_shield_desc:
I can see a weird rune on it,
that reads... {CHANCE}% chance ...
Whatever.
axe_desc:
I better save this one for
the day when I get out of
this place. That happens soon, right?
back_gun_desc:
Ouch, I just shot my leg!
Well I can use this gun
for fast killing... myself!
bk_sword_desc:
Oh this sword belongs to the Burning Knight!
I bet it was created by Oszor.
black_heart_desc:
I can barely read the runes... {DAMAGE} damage to _ enemies in
the _ when you get hit.
_ to Heinur, the protective demon.
blood_crown_desc:
I feel like it's not a good idea
to put this thing on! It is all in enemy blood on outside.
Lets hope mine wont mix with it.
blood_ring_desc:
This ring pulses like if it
was alive, uhh, ugly!
blue_book_desc:
Titled: How to be economic both in real
life and not only. On the back side I can barely read:
...Allows to sacrifice health to use less mana.
Use with caution.
blue_shovel_desc:
I find too many shovels in this castle.
This one is blue for somer eason, tho...
blue_watch_desc:
I can see magical sparks, and time
around those watch seems to go slower.
bomb_desc:
This thing was invented by one my old friends
but stolen by people.
bomb_in_abomb_desc:
I see, humans modified our bombs a bit,
now they have a few smaller ones inside,
how cool is that!
book_of_crazy_particles_desc:
I think it should be great to provide light
in dark places!
book_of_green_energy_desc: The only thing I can say that it looks great.
book_of_magic_aim_desc:
Wew the creator of this book must've been
an insane mage. How would you teach a particle
follow its target?!
book_of_magic_missile_desc: Runes on it say... Created by Heinur ...Oh no!
book_of_magic_trinity_desc: I mean more is always better, except when it's not tasty!
book_of_magic_wall_desc: A castle from those walls would look great!
bow_desc: It's time to learn how to use this thing.
bread_desc: Finally, I found a gluten free bread!
bronze_shotgun_desc: Yesss, this shotgun is much better!
burning_key_desc:
Oh that's probably the key from the door to the next level!
It's pulsing with dark energy.
Almost all castle doors are open now!
burst_gun_desc: I will have to think if I should use this one or not.
butcher_desc: Did I just found a... MEAT KNIFE?
campfire_in_a_bottle_desc: Feels warm and comfy in my hands.
challenge_rune_desc:
It reads... Extra defense and extra challenge
...I wonder what the challenge part is
chicken_sword_desc: Never been to KFC or Mc Donald's.
chopper_desc: What a weird name for a gun.
claymore_desc: Too heavy for me, tho it looks great.
clock_heart_desc:
To me it looks like a prototype of heart implant,
but I dont think it gone well.
cobalt_shield_desc:
I feel that nothing can move me out of
my place now!
cross_desc: I guess it gives me {TIME} seconds of immortality!
cursed_aim_desc:
Looks like it was cursed by Heinur.
I think I still can use this thing to
deal more damage!
dagger_desc: Dagger is one of goblins favorite weapons!
damage_emblem_desc: It reads: gives a {PERCENT}% damage boost to owner.
defense_emblem_desc: It reads: gives a +{PERCENT}% defense boost to owner.
demage_emblem_desc: Looks like half damage and half defense emblems to me.
dew_vial_desc:
Gives a chance to heal you when
you enter a room with enemies.
dialog_why_are_you_killing_my_lieges: Hey, {SHAKE}you{ENDSHAKE}! {WAIT}Why are you killing my lieges?
diamond_desc:
We found a lot of those
in our mines. So many, that we started
to throw those away. It looks like humans value them tho.
diamond_sword_desc:
Oh this sword looks great! Totally
better than mine current weapon.
The power of DIAMONDS!
dont_get_hit_in_boss_fight_achievement_d: Don't get hurt in a boss fight
eco_wand_desc: I think WWF would be happy to have one!
elemental_ring_desc: I can't remember... Was it fire, water, ice and... chocolate?
fire_bombs_desc: Created in the depths of goblin mines, to get rid of some nasty ores.
fire_boots_desc: Sets enemies on-fire, when you touch them.
fire_extinguisher_desc:
I guess fire is no issue for
me anymore! (Well, if it works)
fire_flower_desc:
It burns in my hands! Should be
a nice thing to have on a weapon.
fire_ring_desc: Runes on the ring say... Gives a {CHANCE}% chance to...
fire_wand_desc: I think Burning Knight will likes this one.
flame_thrower_desc:
Well now this is my new favorite weapon
on the side with Fire Staff!
flippers_desc: How should I run in these...
fortune_armor_desc:
This armor was great one day,
but now its broken. It has a {CHANCE}% to multiply
your defense by 2 on hit,
otherwise it will divide it.
fungi_hat_desc:
Mushrooms will rule the world,
if goblins fail!
gold_ring_desc:
You gain {CHANCE}% more gold!
What can be better?
goo_desc:
One of the strange creatures found
in the deep caves. It can do
a good job at protecting you!
gravity_booster_desc:
When equipped, I feel like I'm heavier.
I wish there was an item that
let me to feel the opposite!
halo_desc:
Holy power is always welcome.
Gives {AMOUNT} hearts.
healing_potion_desc: I guess it magically restores my health.
killer_item_desc: Don't do it, don't do it, don't do it!
ice_bombs_desc: Used a lot in hot areas.
ice_boots_desc:
Freezes enemies on-touch.
Gives immunity to frozen.
ice_ring_desc:
It has a big number on it: {CHANCE}%.
What could that mean?
ice_skates_desc: Now I just need other stuff to play ho—Åkey.
ice_wand_desc: The wood is really chill and I can see through it!
izu_desc:
I wonder what did humans mean,
when they named it.
key_a_desc: I think it should opens a cage or something.
laser_aim_desc:
It will aim for me, but I'm
still probably going to miss.
lightsaber_desc:
On dark side they have donuts on Friday...
Maybe I should note that for the next blackfriday.
lucky_bullet_desc:
Via some magic gives you
a {PERCENT}% chance to save ammo.
lucky_cube_desc:
One day it was strong. Now it's broken.
Gives you a {CHANCE}% to deal two times
more damage, otherwise - two times less.
machine_gun_desc:
When guns become too common, someone
decided to stand out a bit.
magic_mushroom_desc: I found it near the castle.
magic_shield_desc:
From what I know it should give me a {CHANCE}%
to block enemy damage. How do I know?
Well, it looks cool...
mana_boots_desc:
Run for your life,
ah wait, for your mana!
mana_emblem_desc:
Was worn by the members of the Return order,
so I guess now it's my turn to wear it.
mana_heart_desc: Two for the price of one!
mana_in_a_bottle_desc:
It's dangerous to go alone,
I will take this with me!
mana_knife_desc:
Created to suck out mana
from it's targets.
mana_ring_desc:
Seems to magically boost your mana regen.
But does it?
matches_desc: I don't think I should ready add more oil into the fire.
meatboy_desc: Where did I see him before...
metal_ring_desc:
Gives a {CHANCE}% chance to reflect
damage onto the attacker.
mimic_summoner_desc:
I should be careful, because this thing
gives a {CHANCE}% chance for a regular chest
to become a mimic.
mimic_totem_desc:
I'm are safe now{ALMOST}.
Lowers the chance to meet a mimic by {CHANCE}%.
morning_desc: To me it looks like a death star.
obsidian_boots_desc: Lava? I'm not scared of it any more.
old_manual_desc:
When you read the docs you'll sure
find some secret features!
penetration_rune_desc: Two (or more) birds with one weapon.
poison_bombs_desc:
If you don't believe me that those are
tasty, try one yourself!
poison_ring_desc: Gives a {CHANCE}% to poison enemies on hit.
poison_wand_desc:
Sweet (I'm not sure, never tried,
if its sweet or not) death.
protective_band_desc:
Somehow saves it manages to
protect me from explosions...
rave_hat_desc: Topper then top is only top top!
reach_desert_achievement_desc: Reach Desert Ruins (PLEASE DO NOT RUIN THEM)
red_balloon_desc:
I don't want to use it before
I will find out if... it... CAN POP?
rifle_desc:
After shotguns became popular,
someone decided to stand out again.
ruby_hat_desc: Ruby means reach, but not for me
scissors_desc: I wonder what can I cut... They kinda look like a pacman.
see_you_in_the_asylum: See you in the Market Place!
shop_sale_desc:
Now I can get all things
in shops with 50% off!
shovel_desc: As our King said (me I mean): Shut up and dig!
skull_hat_desc: Trick or treat? (other options are welcome!)
slow_book_desc: Come on, why is it SO SLOW?
smart_bullet_desc: There's a {PERCENT}% chance that it'll return!
spectacles_desc:
Useful used them to find things
in the darkness.
star_on_a_string_desc:
Where did this one come from?
Andromeda or Sombrero... or The Black Eye! :O
stop_and_play_desc: When I stay still, I deal more damage.
sword_desc: I think nothing can be better then this metal stick.
thorn_ring_desc: Enemies take damage when they touch me, OP, right?
time_bullet_desc: Manages time. How? Don't ask me, I'm only a goblin.
triple_machine_gun_desc:
When riffles become common,
someone decided to stand out...
vampire_ring_desc: Gives a {CHANCE}% chance to gain health when hitting an enemy.
viking_hat_desc: Looks like a weapon itself to me.
vvvvv_desc: I get more gold (and more trouble).
waterbolt_desc: Does this have anything to do with... Dirtaria?
yellow_book_desc:
Grants you more mana
for the cost of your damage.
dialog_how_is_it: Hi, how is it going? {WAIT}I hope other traders are doing fine.
dialog_buy_upgrades: I sell permanent upgrades, {WAIT}that will make all your runs stronger!
dialog_weapon: Hey you, {WAIT}want a cool weapon? {WAIT}Just pick any, {WAIT}these will appear down in the castle.
dialog_take_care: Take care! {WAIT}{WAIT}3 times a day after food.
dialog_pppotions: 3 halfs of a lit... {WAIT}Ah sorry, you are here? Want some nice things?
dialog_cend: {SHAKE}GET OUT OF HERE!{ENDSHAKE} {WAIT}{WAIT}{WAIT}Or buy those {WAVE}delicious{ENDWAVE} items at 1k diamonds each ;)
dialog_look_nicer: Heya, do you want to look {WAIT}{WAVE}fabulous{ENDWAVE}?
dialog_not_so: No, {WAIT}not so {WAVE}fabulous{ENDWAVE} like me. But still much better!
dialog_try: I mean, you can {WAIT}{WAIT}try{WAIT}{WAIT}, maybe{WAIT}{WAIT}, probably{WAIT}{WAIT}, one day{WAIT}.{WAIT}.{WAIT}.
dialog_sorry: No, sorry, I don't sell jetpacks yet. {WAIT}I'm working on that.
dialog_buy_accessory: In the mean while you still can buy some awesome things like{WAIT}.{WAIT}.{WAIT}. {WAIT}um.{WAIT}.{WAIT}.
dialog_see_self: Well, just have a look! {WAIT}{WAIT}Or two. {WAIT}{WAIT}One look is good two bought things are better!
scroll_of_upgrade_desc:
Now I can upgrade one of my items!
Click on it to upgrade!
It also removes curse.
bomb_summoner_desc: Note on the side: use with care
